name: Hamburger
recipe: Juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, ketchup, and mustard on a sesame seed bun.

name: Cheeseburger
recipe: Same as hamburger with an additional slice of cheese.

name: Chicken Nuggets
recipe: Bite-sized pieces of tender chicken breast, coated in seasoned breadcrumbs.

name: French Fries
recipe: Crispy golden potato fries lightly seasoned with salt.

name: Chicken Sandwich
recipe: Grilled or crispy chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.

name: BBQ Ribs
recipe: Tender, slow-cooked pork ribs slathered in smoky BBQ sauce.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipe: Toasted bread with melted American cheese.

name: Hot Dog
recipe: Juicy beef hot dog served in a soft bun with your choice of toppings.

name: Onion Rings
recipe: Crispy battered onion rings, perfect for dipping.

name: Milkshake
recipe: Creamy vanilla milkshake topped with whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Pizza Slice
recipe: Classic cheese pizza slice with marinara sauce on a thin crust.

name: Taco
recipe: Soft or crispy taco shell filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Burrito
recipe: Flour tortilla filled with rice, beans, cheese, meat, and salsa.

name: Nachos
recipe: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapenos, sour cream, and guacamole.

name: Ice Cream Cone
recipe: Classic vanilla ice cream in a sugar cone.

name: Chicken Tenders
recipe: Breaded chicken tenderloins served with dipping sauce.

name: Fish Sandwich
recipe: Battered fish fillet with lettuce, tartar sauce, and a slice of cheese on a bun.

name: Fish and Chips
recipe: Crispy battered fish served with french fries and tartar sauce.

name: Chocolate Shake
recipe: Rich chocolate milkshake topped with whipped cream and chocolate syrup.
